pull.title: Add missing lock in CScheduler::AreThreadsServicingQueue()
pull.body:
Not an actual bug as this is only used in asserts right now, but
nice to not have a missing lock.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message:
Add missing lock in CScheduler::AreThreadsServicingQueue()

Not an actual bug as this is only used in asserts right now, but
nice to not have a missing lock.

issue.title: Support for validation interface signals in background thread
issue.body:
Another step forward in the wallet signals processing in the background thread + node validation <--> wallet separation long working paths.

 Adapting:
 * #10178
 * #10179
 * #10221
 * #10914
 * #11783
 * Plus added an extra cleanup to the validation interface removing unused `NotifyTransactionLock` signal and its respective slots.
